code: import selectTiles from'./selectTiles.js';import putTilesIntoRow from'./putTilesIntoRow.js';import startNewGame from'./startNewGame.js';import setName from'./setName.js';import selectNumPlayer from'./selectNumPlayer.js';var reducer=function reducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case'SELECT_TILES':return selectTiles(state,action.payload);case'PUT_TILES_INTO_ROW':return putTilesIntoRow(state,action.payload);case'START_NEW_GAME':return startNewGame(state);case'SELECT_NUM_PLAYER':return selectNumPlayer(state,action.payload);case'SET_NAME':return setName(state,action.payload);default:return state;}};export default reducer;
